text: He ’ s known as “ The Situation ” on the fist - pumping MTV reality show Jersey Shore. Mike Sorrentino rose to fame during the first season when he and the gang partied many a night at local dance clubs. However, the wild life soon became a problem for the reality star, now 35. Here we ’ ll delve into the recent ups and downs in the life of “ The Situation ” from celebrating a sobriety milestone to pleading guilty to tax fraud.
